resources.string: Use TryCamel to see the price history of items on Amazon.
Step 1: Shop as you normally do with the Amazon app or a web browser.
Step 2: On any product, locate the share button.
You can find it. I believe in you.
Step 3: Use that share button and share with TryCamel
Step 4: That\'s it. \nTry it now with this link: http://a.co/4ps1EIe
And this app is free? Whoever made this must be the nicest person.
